Description:
WALK TO BEACH!!!
This charming 3 bedroom home features spacious open plan living with easy maintenance tiled floor, split- system airconditioner, woodheater, cosy modern kitchen with dishwasher, sliding door to wide deck area with sink for cleaning the fish and great for bbq's, 3 bedrooms all with BIRs , family bathroom with double shower, 2 toilets and good size laundry. A single car carport is to the side of the house.
Situated on an undulating block with gate to park ideal for kids or going for a walk. This very appealing property is ideal for permanent or rental.
Only 25 mins to major shopping centre and Phillip Island, local primary school and kindergarten approx.. 5 mins.

Description:
DECEASED ESTATE SALE
IDEAL RENTAL OR HOLIDAY HOME!!This 2 bedroom property is located within walking distance of a safe sandy swimming beach, playground, bbq area and local shop.
Featuring open plan kitchen, meals and living area with exposed beams. Timber walls and timber ceilings throughout give a lot of warmth to the home as well as being low maintenance. Both bedrooms would fit a queen size bed.
Along the front is a full verandah with room for setting, good size backyard with garden shed, carport along one side. The property is fully fenced with some established trees.
Currently rented out for $170 per week. The tenant is quite happy to continue staying on if it is sold as a rental property. Only minutes away is local primary school, kindergarten and cafe, wineries and a small group of local shops. Phillip Island is approx. 20 mins away.

Description:
MASSIVE WESTERNPORT VIEWS!
Pristine presentation and perfect ocean views set the scene for what is a very special property and has been priced to be on the market for a limited time only.
With uninterrupted views from the picturesque Bass Hills right around to Westernport Bay and beyond, this stylish, light filled home has to be one of the finest available on the current market. Quality finishes, a finely refined and practical floorplan makes this outstanding piece of real estate perfect for an investor, owner occupier or for a holiday home.
A driveway down the side of the property to the rear boundary allows perfect access for a caravan, boat or vehicles. Backing onto farmland also gives you the assurity of a peaceful lifestyle for many, many years to come. Call today to book your private appointment.

Address: 35 Bass Horizon Promenade Coronet Bay VIC 3984
Description:
BEACH RETREAT
Commanding a terrific position walking distance to the beach we are very excited to be marketing this fabulous home.
Showcasing a contemporary floorplan over two levels the property is suitable as much as a holiday getaway as a permanent home.
The open plan kitchen living and living stairs is wrapped by a lengthy balcony and invites glimpses of bay views, a perfect zone for relaxing.
With easy access to a generous garage there is also plenty of accommodation for the summer toys and being positioned on a low maintenance corner allotment you have plenty of access to the rear of the property for boats, jet skis etc.
Available with a quick settlement this delightful home is ready to be enjoyed straight away.

COASTAL BRICK HOME - WALK TO BEACH!

- Sunken formal lounge with exposed beams and brick feature wall.

- 2 good size bedrooms with wall to wall carpet and built in robes.
- Good size office/study or 3rd bedroom.
- Spacious laundry.
- Family bathroom with bath and separate shower.
- Back veranda.
- Garden shed and wood shed.
- Single garage with concrete floor and power.
- Good size backyard.
- Carport.

This property is fully fenced and is low maintenance.

Description:
GREAT FAMILY HOLIDAY HOME !!!!
Bright and clean 3 bedroom besser brick home within walking distance of a safe sandy swimming beach.
Featuring upstairs an open plan living area with polished timber floors, split-system aircon and gas heating, sliding door to large decking with sail for those sunny days so you can still sit out and enjoy without getting burnt, good size kitchen with island bench giving plenty of room for breakfast stools, 3 double size bedrooms, robes and ceiling fan, renovated family bathroom with toilet.
There is plenty of access to outside from upstairs as stairs at back of house and side of house which leads to wide deck area and extra door in living area for access to front deck.
Downstairs features a large games/rumpus room, an extra living area or extra bedroom for those visitors or teenagers who love their own space, a laundry where you could put a fridge and microwave as it has plenty of room and there is a 2nd toilet.
Bring the boat as there is a boat/caravan area, plus single garage with power, circular driveway and private fenced backyard.
The beach is a great family friendly beach with playground and bbq area with local shop only metres away. Located approx. 20 mins to Phillip Island, 25 mins to major shopping centre, approx. 7 mins to local shops, cafes and wineries and CBD approx. 1 hr 20 mins with dual lane highway.
We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au

Description:
METRES TO SANDY SWIMMING BEACH!!
What do we all want when looking for that perfect holiday home - Location! Views! Affordability!
This property ticks all the boxes when looking for that ideal beach retreat, with nothing more to do than move straight in! Thus affording the assured luxury of spending more time enjoying the beach and beautiful coastal walks, without having the worry of renovating.
Featuring a very neat 2 storey home which offers:
UPSTAIRS
* A light filled, open plan living with gorgeous alcove area
* Sliding door to balcony boasting bay views
* Modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher
* Floating timber floor * Split-system air conditioner
* Master bedroom with wall to wall carpet and built in robe
* Bathroom with double shower recess
DOWNSTAIRS
* 2nd living area
* 2 bedrooms
* Family bathroom
* Undercover paved entertainment area with sink
* HUGE shed 9m x 6m x 3metres high, fantastic for boat or caravan, concreted and powered
* BONUS - large STUDIO 9m x 3m for those extra visitors or great for the art lovers
* Sunblinds * Fully fenced * Fire pit
* Stoned driveway * Established gardens
You can pack the car and kids up on a Friday night as there is great commuting from Melbourne, with dual lane highway, taking approximately 1 hour and 15 minutes. Local cafes and shops approximately 7 minutes and major shopping centre and Phillip Island approximately 25 minutes away.
Inspection a must - for this price you are getting a 2 storey home only metres to beach with a huge shed, studio and bay views.

Description:
SLEEK & REFRESHING
The Vendors have given us clear instructions and this stunning property must be sold with a flexible settlement available to the lucky purchaser.
With serene ocean and rural views apparent from this lovely home's elevated position. This is more than just a property, it's a lifestyle! The breathtaking open plan living space features beautiful polished floorboards, raised ceiling and incorporates indoor and outdoor living seamlessly. The kitchen features all modern conveniences that any amateur chef would be impressed by as well as a plethora of storage options. The inclusion of a new ensuite to the master bedroom is also an attractive proposition.
Plenty of housing for vehicles and storage here too with an enclosed garage under the house, including another lined room perfect for a gym, another bedroom or even a mancave! Any way you look at it, this home represents tremendous value and could be yours to enjoy this Summer. Please call to arrange your inspection.

Address: 52 Cutty Sark Road Coronet Bay VIC 3984
Description:
CORNER BLOCK - 3 B/R HOME - FULLY FURNISHED !!!
This immaculate 3 bedroom home is perfect for a carefree holiday home. As for the price, it comes FULLY FURNISHED (not the paintings) and is only a few hundred metres walk to a safe sandy swimming beach, playground and shop.
Featuring verandah along front with double door entrance to a good size living area with polished timber floors, which are in very good condition, wood heater, air conditioner, meals area with door to outside private patio/deck area. Cosy bright kitchen, good size bedrooms, all with polished timber floors, and the 2nd having a door which is opens out onto verandah - great for those balmy nights when you can open and let a sea breeze through.
As soon as you step through those front double doors you know that it has been loved by the vendor and oozes a homely and warm feeling. The property is a corner block which offers two vehicle access points - one up to carport and the other via gates where you can bring the boat, trailer or caravan through to backyard. You also have some shedding. 570 sqm approx.
The established gardens and fencing make a pretty picture of this charming cottage style home. Great location - bus at door. Affordable price - inspection a must. Local cafes, major shopping centre, tourist attractions, Phillip Island, wineries, schools etc. are all within 30 mins. Great commuting to CBD with dual lane highway.

Description:
CORNER BLOCK - BAY VIEWS!!!
Upon entering the home you will be welcomed by a good size entrance with high ceilings. The features of this very well kept split-level home include a low maintenance interior, open plan living and kitchen area upstairs with cathedral ceilings, wood heater, split-system aircon, sliding doors to decking on 2 sides which offers very good bay views and plenty of room for bbq, table and chairs. The meals area also captures bay views to make eating more enjoyable and relaxing. The cosy kitchen offers island bench, dishwasher, rangehood, electric hotplates and stove.
Downstairs features 3 good size double bedrooms with BIRs and carpet, family bathroom with separate shower and bath and a good size laundry.
Situated on a great corner block, with extra room for boat/caravan, double garage, fenced backyard. The vendor has maintained this property as you will see from inspections.
Coronet Bay offers a great family swimming beach, local shop, playground, bbq area and bus service. Located approx. 25 mins to major shopping centre, local shops, cafes, wineries, doctor, chemist approx. 7 minutes and Phillip Island approx. 20 mins.

Address: 10 Champs Elysees Promenade Coronet Bay VIC 3984
Description:
STUNNING OCEAN VIEWS FOREVER!
Welcome to 10 Champ Elysees Promenade, the most sought after address in the whole of Coronet Bay. Possessing open ocean views that can never be built out, you can buy in good faith knowing that your investment is more than protected.
Apart from the amazing views of Westernport Bay, features include 3 large bedrooms with robes, fantastic open plan living where the views are available from every angle, spacious kitchen with loads of storage, reverse cycle, immaculately kept bathroom and a brick double garage with access for the boat, caravan and vehicles.
The land directly adjacent to the property can never be built on but will make a fantastic spot for the family to enjoy a hit of cricket without the maintenance. Do not make a mistake that you will regret. Pick up the phone now or it will be gone before you know it.

Description:
Superb Location, Stunning Views
Open For Inspections: Sundays at 10.30am or by appointment afterwards.
This outstanding double storey residence will have you the envy of all your friends, with 360 degree views, four robed bedrooms and two bathroom it's just a few hundred meters to the beach and has a general store situated at the end of the street. Perfect for large families and groups of friends to relax and enjoy all tnat Coronet Bay has to offer. With a large upstairs balcony both at the front and rear of the house there are sweeping views of Westernport Bay, a lovely, bright open plan living area plus a large kitchen and dining upstairs, 2 sheds with plenty of storage space and Vegetable patch. Perfect for local families to enjoy their day to day life style or for the city slickers to get away and enjoy with friends and family.
Photo I.D Required at all open for inspections.

When a number of weather conditions converge simultaneously they con create the
'perfect storm'.

Description:
PERFECT LOCATION
Just two and a half years old, this quality built family home features 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The Modern kitchen features 900mm stainless steel appliances. The open plan living opens into an enclosed back deck where you can enjoy outdoor living in the summer months. During winter the cosy wood fire will keep you warm, whilst watching a move in the home theatre or playing a game in the games room.
Outside all the work has been done, there are 2 work sheds and a boat parking area. This property is in a great area walking distance to shops, community centre and the jetty. Just 36 Minutes to Pakenham, 50 Minutes to Dandenong and South East suburbs via a dual lane highway to this idyllic bayside village.

Description:
Appealing Coastal Block!!
WE ARE ACTIVE FOR APPRAISALS & INSPECTIONS.
Located in a quiet street and only 5 minutes walk to the beach, this fully fenced, gently sloping 556sqm block has potential to be a great investment for the astute buyer. Build your dream home and capture views above the trees to the waters of Western Port Bay and French Island. With the developing township of Grantville only a 3 minute drive away offering chemist, post office, permanent doctor, ambulance depot, cafes and bakeries, youll have all you need at your fingertips. There are also Primary and Secondary Schools in the area for families. The dual lane Bass Highway nearby makes commuting a breeze and with major shopping centres and famous Phillip Island all under half an hour this block is in the perfect position to make that move to the coast so much easier.
Disclaimer - We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au

Description:
A BEAUTY ON BALCOMBE
This little beach house won't last long! Situated on approximately 1000 square metres behind a picket fence, is this lovely home. With mature trees to the front and rear garden, plenty of space for the kids, a couple of dogs and a veggie patch. This lovely little house is ready for your inspection!
Entering via the front covered decking, to the main lounge room which is carpeted and looks out to the front yard. Walk through to the main living zone which is centrally situated and overlooks the rear garden. Kitchen has electric appliances and plenty of space and is well serviced by the long meals and living space. Master bedroom include walk in robe and ensuite. A further two bedrooms to the other end of the home with built in robes, main bathroom with separate shower and bath, separate toilet and laundry which steps out to the rear covered deck which is perfect for entertaining. For those looking for a workshop, there is a great sized double garage which is in fantastic condition with concrete floor.
This property is currently tenanted however the property may be sold with vacant possession (subject to terms). Please contact our team to discuss this great value property today on 5678 8433.

Description:
The Ultimate In Modern Beachside Living!!
Immaculately presented and in a prized position, this elegant home is located in the popular Corinella area. The home features a spacious lounge flowing into the tiled dining area and kitchen with modern appliances and reverse cycle air conditioning. There are 3 spacious bedrooms with built-ins & carpet throughout, share bathroom. The well-appointed master suite also includes a walk-in wardrobe and ensuite, a fully functional laundry. Great size backyard fully fenced. Remote control double garage with extra space than the normal size double garage with access to the backyard complete this family-friendly home.
With the foreshore at the end of the street, walking tracks & Corinella boat ramp only minutes away this home delivers a premium coastal lifestyle. Easy access to the General Store, Fig In The Bay cafÃ© Restaurant, Park, Community Centre, Tennis Courts, Primary School, Early Learning Child Care Hub, and all that the Bass Coast has to offer in a great coastal lifestyle.
Inspection is a must on this property.
Strict health and safety measures are in place when viewing the property.
NOTE- CORONAVIRUS PRECAUTION: If you are unwell or displaying any flu like symptoms, please do not attend our open for inspection.
Contact Daniel or Tamara Leskie to arrange your private inspection or live streamed virtual inspection
